name: Storyly - Customize your story covers!
description:
Story group covers are the entry points where your users first contact with, and then tap into to enter stories. With Storyly you can fully customize these entry points. This includes turning them into cards, putting titles on images or adding story circles on top of your covers. Just unleash your imagination and design the best story covers for your app or website. Take a look at some cool examples that we created for you to get inspired.


https://storyly.io/
